Text:
One day, Rose Oriana walks about the academy,
a book clutched in her arms—
(Not here either... Where could Cid have gone?)

(I really wanted to talk to him about Natsume's new
book...)

(He'll be dying to rave about it, too... That's just
how great of a book it is.)

(A tale of love between two people of different
social standing...just like he and I. There was one
scene I found particularly wonderful—)

On this day Rose, princess of a kingdom, teeters on
the brink of despair. Torn away from her beloved,
she had been dragged off to marry someone she
despised—

—Does the bride swear to love her husband, to honor
and cherish him all the days of her life?

(Truth be told, I never wanted it to come to this.
But if I run away now, the life of the one I truly
love will be in grave danger...)

(And if that is what is at stake...then vowing to
love another is a small price to pay. It is the best
choice for your sake, my love...)
Stop right there!!!

Suddenly the large doors of the church burst open,
and a young man comes rushing into the hall.

I object to this marriage! I'm here to save you,
Rose! Come with me!
Wh-Why are you here...?!

Because you're about to make a false vow of love.
And I...cannot let that happen!
It...it's not false! I'm here by my own will!

There's no way I, a princess, could ever be with one
of common birth! If you understand my words, then
leave this place at once!

(I never wanted to say such things to you... But if
it will spare you sorrow down the road, then I will
glady accept your hate...!)
Is that...what you really want?
Y-Yes! Of course it is!

If so, then why...why are there tears streaming down
your face?
...What? No, I... No...

Rose. The love that fills your gaze as you look at
me is no lie. Is this not what your heart truly
desires?
Let's go. False love will never make anyone happy.

...Yes. So long as it is with you, I will go
anywhere!
Now, take my hand—
Halt, scoundrel! You cannot escape!
Tsk, I'm surrounded...!

Get behind me, Rose. I promise I'll get us out of
here.
Cid...

(His hands are trembling... He's mustered all of his
courage, all for my sake...)
(And yet I merely stand here—)
This is your final warning! Give up now or face—

...I will allow none to bar our path. Step aside at
once!
Rose?! Stay back, it's too dangerous!

...My dear Cid. I cannot make a vow of love that is
untrue...for my heart belongs to you alone.

But that does not mean it must always be you who
protects me! Now it is my turn to keep you safe!
Rose...!

Let us carve a future for ourselves with our own
hands!

(And so the two of them escaped hand-in-hand, bound
together by the strength of true love...)

(*sigh* What glorious devotion...! If only Cid and I
could have something so fateful, so breathtaking—)
Oh, Cid! I've been looking all over for you!
R-Really...

I swear I will make you happy, Cid! No, let us find
happiness together!
Uh... What?
Don't your worry! Our future will be a bright one!

...What the heck? Is she trying to get me to join a
cult? Maybe run a scam on me...?

Cid's bewilderment and shocked expression go
unnoticed by Rose, her cheeks flushed with joy,
a book clutched fiercely to her chest—
